summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 1 and 2, Block 1, McAllister's Addition; also Lots 13 and 14, Block 46, Boston Company's Plat; also the east one half of Block 13, Supplementary Plat of Edes & Knight's Addition; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-25 and 17-20.
